title: Notion
description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the Notion Source. The options determine how a page in Notion gets mapped to a TMS type in Faros, i.e., a project, epic, sprint or task, and further how properties on that page are mapped to properties of the selected type, e.g., which page property should map to a Faros task's status field. While there are only a handful of required options, you will likely need to override the default property name mappings to match the property names in your Notion account.

kind_property.title: Kind Property
kind_property.description: The name of the page property whose value determines what kind of object a page is, i.e., a project, epic, sprint, or task. It must have a select type in Notion. It's expected that each kind of page has a unique, fixed value, which must be provided in the kind-specific configuration sections.
